oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Government Boulevard on Crest of Missionary Ridge, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted and enhanced photograph of Government Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga, Tennessee. A tower is visible in the distance. Features a divided back and a logo for the Ottmar Zieher postcard publishing company in the bottom left corner on reverse. Postcard made in Germany. [No. 2111]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Mountains; Trees; Towers
